EmailTemplate.subject: Australia Post - Case: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Help & Support
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Your parcel {!Case.ReferenceID__c} is due for delivery today.
What if you're not home?
If nobody’s home we’ll still deliver your item, provided we can leave it in a safe place. Otherwise we'll take it to a Post Office for you to collect.
As your parcel is due for delivery today, we'll close your enquiry. If you have any questions about your parcel delivery, please reply to this email and we'll be happy to help.
To find out more about your options for future deliveries, see Delivery options.
Thank you,
Australia Post {!Case.Thread_Id}
